body_html:
How is "fewer" not grammatically correct?

You mean “correct” instead of “not correct”? I learned it this way that you use “fewer” for things that you count (1, 2, 3, ...) and “less” for quantities that you don’t count (eg sth like fewer words but less text)
body_text:
How is "fewer" not grammatically correct?

You mean “correct” instead of “not correct”? I learned it this way that you use “fewer” for things that you count (1, 2, 3, ...) and “less” for quantities that you don’t count (eg sth like fewer words but less text)
body:
> How is "fewer" not grammatically correct?

You mean “correct” instead of “not correct”? I learned it this way that you use “fewer” for things that you count (1, 2, 3, ...) and “less” for quantities that you don’t count (eg sth like fewer words but less text)
